package.name: Zentio_Zentio
package.summary: Zent.io Multi-Channel Contact Center and Customer Support integrated into your store.
package.description:
Zent.io is a Contact Center/Customer Support Cloud Software Multichannel that unify chat, phone and e-mail. All the communication channels will be answered from a single interface. The agent will only need a web browser.

See our website

  • No upfront investment
  • No software/hardware required
  • Multichannel Administration
  • Multichannel Workplace
  • Dashboards and Reports
  • Multichannel Ticket/Case Management
  • Smart customer management
  • Team management
  • Shift planning
  • Outsourcing features
  • Service management
  • Collaborative tools
  • Remote agents

Chat

Increase the productivity of your agents and customers engagement.

Real time chatting with a customer support expert not only builds customers‘ confidence during their shopping experience, but also helps to improve your conversion rates. According to a survey of American online consumers, 68% engage in live chat and 63% prefer getting back to a website with live chat for repeat purchase.

  • Multiple chat sessions
  • Transfer chats
  • Chat whispering
  • Gather user info
  • Auto grettings message
  • Cobrowsing
  • Customizable
  • Smart canned answers
  • Prechat form
  • Load balancing
  • Reports and KPIs
  • Javascript API
  • Real time messages delivery
  • Integration with GA

Voice

Reduce your tech costs.

With our IVR templates builder, contact center administrator will be able to define advanced behaviors on incoming calls for a service/project. Since it's easy to use any administrator or supervisor can use since it doesn't require tech skills.

  • IVR templates
  • No extra software required
  • Voice recording
  • Reporting and KPIs
  • Load balancing
  • VoIP

Email

Improve your response time and productivity of your team. Manage all the incoming messages from customers to your contact center.

  • Incoming mail management
  • Fully customizable
  • Reporting and KPIs

Customer Portal

Share important information with customers.

Customer Portal helps to solve to customers questions from a service/project so they can solve them by themselves furthermore to add a new channel where the customer can start a case/ticket.

  • Advanced search and categorization
  • Fully customizable
  • Ticket/Case submission

Integration to Magento

You will see last orders and last order details for each customer that access to your customer service.

Also for outsources

Whether we are a contact center inside a company or a contact center that provides services to customers for other companies that outsource their customer care, being multichannel is a necessity nowadays. Give a step forward with Zent.io.

Datasheet

More
